channel.title: Need help with shops
channel.description:
Ok well ive added a shop and stuff like that i added items but the items wont appear
heres the codes
Autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 553 2593 3088 0 0 0 0 0 1 10 Abury magic man[/code] Shops.cfg [code]Shop = 30 Runes 20 25 558 500[/code]
i have 2 shops.cfg heres the other [code]shop = 2 Aubury's_Rune_Store 10 25 558 500[/code]
And finaly the wanneshop = 30
ive done it all rite but nothing appears in shops.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 05:58:58 am[/size][hr]BUMP look no 1 even helps
